All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class ExportController
extends Controller

This controller defines all the methods to export the data to the 3rd Party vendors/external servers.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static ExportController getInstance()
Returns an instance of the ExportController.

exportDataToQC

public void exportDataToQC(java.lang.String prm_sTestSuiteName,
                           java.util.Set<AutomationTest> prm_lAllTests,
                           java.util.Set<AutomationTest> prm_lAllFailedTests)
If called, this method looks at the current ApplicationContext, fetches the information of all the test cases that have failed. Then generates a report, finally pushes the report to the specified QC server.

Parameters:
prm_sTestSuiteName - : Name of the Test Suite.
prm_lAllTests - : All the Tests that have been executed in the Suite.
prm_lAllFailedTests - : List of all the test cases that have failed.

exportReportDataToGit

public void exportReportDataToGit(java.lang.String prm_sReportData)
The method exports the desired Report data to the QC server. The configuration of the QC server must be specified in the TestCass.Properties file.
